description: This file defines a Data Access Object (DAO) interface for interacting with the 'tasks' table in a Room database, including methods for observing, inserting, updating, and deleting tasks.

classes.name: TaskDao
classes.description: Interface providing database access methods for tasks, including observing, inserting, updating, and deleting task entries.

methods.name: observeAll
methods.description: Returns a Flow emitting the list of all tasks ordered by creation date in descending order.

methods.name: insert
methods.description: Inserts a new task into the database, replacing on conflict, and returns the new row ID.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Updates an existing task in the database.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Deletes a specified task from the database.

methods.name: deleteById
methods.description: Deletes a task from the database based on its ID.

methods.name: setCompleted
methods.description: Updates the 'completed' status and 'updatedAt' timestamp of a task identified by its ID.
